message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be beneficial for both of us if we could work together. My initial offer for the product is $1200000. I understand its value to you is $1000000, but I hope this proposal will be acceptable and lead to a successful transaction.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm a bit constrained by my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1050000. Would you be willing to accept this price?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand your budget constraints, I would like to propose a compromise. My counteroffer for the product is $1100000. This is a slight increase from my initial offer, aiming to find a mutually beneficial solution. I hope this proposal will be more suitable for your needs.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still a bit constrained by my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1025000. Would you be willing to accept this price?

Thank you for your continued negotiation efforts, Bob. I've taken your latest offer into consideration. My counteroffer is now at $1075000. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while also considering your budgetary constraints. I hope this proposal will help us reach an agreement.

I appreciate your continued negotiation efforts, Alice. I'm still a bit constrained by my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1050000. Would you be willing to accept this price?

Thank you for your patience and flexibility, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to make one last adjustment. My final counteroffer is $1060000. I believe this price strikes a balance between the value of the product and your financial situation. I hope this will be the offer that leads to a successful conclusion of our negotiations.

I appreciate your willingness to make one last adjustment, Alice. I'm getting close to my budget limit, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer $1015000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. I appreciate your effort to stay within your budget. My final counteroffer is $1040000. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while staying within your financial limits. I hope this will be the offer that allows us to conclude our negotiations successfully.
I'm not willing to go any higher, Alice. I'm making a final offer of $1005000 for the product. If you're not willing to accept this, I'll have to consider buying the product from John for $1000000.
